ca.uqac.lif.cep.concurrency

Class ThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.concurrency.ThreadManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ThreadManager
extends Object
implements Runnable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ThreadManager.ManagedThread
      A thread managed by a thread manager.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ThreadManager defaultManager
      An instance of thread manager used as a default.
      protected int m_maxThreads
      The maximum number of threads this manager is allowed to keep at any moment
      protected boolean m_run
      Whether the manager is running
      protected Set<ThreadManager.ManagedThread> m_threads
      The set of threads managed by this manager
      protected int m_threadsGranted
      Total number of threads granted.
      protected Lock m_threadsLock
      A lock to access the thread set
      protected int m_threadsRequested
      Total number of threads requested.
      protected static long s_sleepInterval
      The time (in milliseconds) between refreshes of the internal state of the manager

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static void allowThreads()
      Tells the default manager to allow threads
      protected void cleanThreads()
      Deletes any thread that is marked as disposable

      Gets the number of threads that have been granted from this manager, so far.

      Gets the number of threads that have been requested from this manager, so far.

      Causes the current thread to sleeps for some time

    • Field Detail

      • defaultManager

        public static final ThreadManager defaultManager
        An instance of thread manager used as a default. The default thread manager forbids the use of threads.

      • m_threads

        protected volatile Set<ThreadManager.ManagedThread> m_threads
        The set of threads managed by this manager

      • m_threadsLock

        protected Lock m_threadsLock
        A lock to access the thread set

      • m_maxThreads

        protected int m_maxThreads
        The maximum number of threads this manager is allowed to keep at any moment

      • s_sleepInterval

        protected static final long s_sleepInterval
        The time (in milliseconds) between refreshes of the internal state of the manager
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • m_run

        protected volatile boolean m_run
        Whether the manager is running

      • m_threadsRequested

        protected int m_threadsRequested
        Total number of threads requested. Used mostly for debugging purposes.

      • m_threadsGranted

        protected int m_threadsGranted
        Total number of threads granted. Used mostly for debugging purposes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadManager

        public ThreadManager()
        Creates a new thread manager

      • ThreadManager

        public ThreadManager(int max_threads)
        Creates a new thread manager
        Parameters:
        max_threads - The maximum number of threads this manager is allowed to keep at any moment. Set to 0 or a negative value to mean no limit

    • Method Detail

      • waitForNewThread

        public ThreadManager.ManagedThread waitForNewThread(Runnable runnable)
        Gets a new instance of managed thread. This method is blocking, i.e. if the manager already has the maximum number of threads allowed, it waits until a new thread can be created.
        Parameters:
        r - The runnable to put into the new thread
        Returns:
        A new thread

      • tryNewThread

        public ThreadManager.ManagedThread tryNewThread(Runnable r)
        Attempts to get a new instance of managed thread. This method is non-blocking: if the manager already has the maximum number of threads allowed, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        r - The runnable to put into the new thread
        Returns:
        A new thread, or null

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • allowThreads

        public static void allowThreads()
        Tells the default manager to allow threads

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long duration)
        Causes the current thread to sleeps for some time
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration in milliseconds

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the thread manager

      • cleanThreads

        protected void cleanThreads()
        Deletes any thread that is marked as disposable

      • getNumThreadsRequested

        public int getNumThreadsRequested()
        Gets the number of threads that have been requested from this manager, so far.
        Returns:
        The number of threads

      • getNumThreadsGranted

        public int getNumThreadsGranted()
        Gets the number of threads that have been granted from this manager, so far.
        Returns:
        The number of threads
